member.name: TF_SELECTIONSTYLE
member.summary: The TF_SELECTIONSTYLE structure represents the style of a selection.

member.name: TF_SELECTIONSTYLE.ase
member.summary: Specifies the active end of the selection. For more information, see .

member.name: TF_SELECTIONSTYLE.fInterimChar
member.summary: Indicates if the selection is an interim character. If this value is nonzero, then the selection is an interim character and ase will be TF_AE_NONE. If this value is zero, the selection is not an interim character.
